description: Common issues, error messages, solutions, and workarounds for Mendix development, runtime, and deployment problems. Practical solutions from real-world experience.

studio_pro_issues.issue: Studio Pro won't start or crashes on startup
solutions: Check Windows Event Viewer for errors
Note: 11.5.0 allows first-time users to use Studio Pro without login
studio_pro_issues.prevention: Keep Studio Pro and Java updated

studio_pro_issues.issue: Memory leaks in Studio Pro (fixed in 11.4/11.5)
solutions: Update to Studio Pro 11.4.0 or 11.5.0 which fixes multiple memory leaks
Restart Studio Pro periodically for older versions
tickets: Memory leak when editing Microflow action
Memory leak when re-opening project or switching branches

symptoms: Error: Project created with newer version
causes: Project created with newer Studio Pro version
solutions: Upgrade Studio Pro to match project version or newer
Check project .mpr file properties for Mendix version
Ask team for correct Studio Pro version
studio_pro_issues.prevention: Team aligns on Studio Pro version, document in README

solutions: Increase JVM heap: Edit studioproprefs.txt, add -Xmx4096m
studio_pro_issues.prevention: 16GB+ RAM, SSD storage, clean project regularly
Use incognito mode for testing, proper deployment process

symptoms: Object cannot be updated, as it is modified by someone else
causes: Multiple users/processes modifying same object simultaneously
Object changed between retrieve and commit
solutions: Enable optimistic locking error handling in microflow
Set error handling to 'Custom with/without Rollback'
Retrieve fresh copy of object from database
Reapply changes and retry the operation
For client: Show 'refresh and try again' message
runtime_errors.code_pattern: Change action → Error handler → Check error type → Retrieve fresh → Reapply → Retry

symptoms: OQL UPDATE statement fails with CardinalityViolationException
causes: SET expression returns multiple rows when only one expected
solutions: Use aggregates (MAX, MIN) if multiple values possible
Add null checks before accessing object
runtime_errors.prevention: Always check object existence before use

solutions: Check for existing records before creating
Use Before Delete event to handle cleanup
Increase session timeout: Runtime settings → Session timeout
runtime_errors.configuration: Development: long timeout. Production: balance security and UX

solutions: Find memory leak: Profile with Performance Tool
Batch large operations: Process 1000 records at a time
runtime_errors.prevention: Proper memory management, batch processing, monitoring

solutions: Optimize microflow: Profile and improve slow parts
Batch operations: Commit every N records
Move to async: Use scheduled events or task queue
Review Before Commit events for heavy logic
Check entity access rules for user role
Review XPath constraints: Entity → Access Rules
Verify user has correct role assigned
Test: Log in as user, check data visibility
Check module roles are mapped to user roles
security_issues.debugging: Enable security logging, check applied constraints

causes: Mendix 11 breaking change: ShowHomePage now respects entity access
solutions: Add Read access to entities shown on home page
Review home page data sources and entities
Grant appropriate entity access for user roles

causes: Microflow has no allowed roles configured
solutions: Set microflow allowed roles: Microflow → Properties → Allowed roles
Don't rely solely on entity access for security
Review all microflows exposed to pages/APIs
Replace calculated attributes with stored values
Add pagination: Limit results per page
Use microflow data source for complex filtering
Use Change List instead of loop with Change
Retrieve over association instead of XPath
Batch operations: Process 100-1000 at a time
Use aggregates instead of retrieving all
performance_issues.profiling: Performance Tool → Run microflow → Analyze results

causes: Processing too much data at once
solutions: Batch large operations: Process in chunks
Limit data retrieved: Use XPath, pagination
performance_issues.monitoring: Use application monitoring tools (Datadog, New Relic)

solutions: Verify URL and endpoint in REST configuration
Add retry logic with exponential backoff
integration_issues.debugging: Enable request logging, use Postman to test API separately

solutions: Publish entity in OData service: Add to published resources
Configure entity access for service user
integration_issues.testing: Use Postman or OData client to test service

solutions: Increase timeout: Web Service Call → Timeout settings
Optimize request payload: Send only needed data
Implement async pattern: Don't wait for response
integration_issues.configuration: Set realistic timeout based on expected response time

solutions: Check consistency errors: F8 in Studio Pro
Verify all modules compatible with target version
deployment_issues.prevention: Run consistency check before deployment, test in acceptance first

symptoms: App fails to start in cloud
solutions: Check application logs in cloud portal
Check scheduled events not causing issues
Rollback to previous version if needed

causes: Constants not configured in target environment
solutions: Cloud Portal → Environments → Constants → Set values
Document all required constants in README
Use naming convention for environment-specific constants
deployment_issues.prevention: Maintain constants checklist, automate where possible

causes: Module built for different Mendix version
solutions: Check module compatibility: Marketplace page → Requirements
Download version matching your Studio Pro
Run module's setup microflow if provided

troubleshooting.description: Quick reference for resolving common Mendix development errors and issues.

CE0001_object_not_found.message: Object of type X not found
CE0001_object_not_found.cause: Referenced entity/microflow was deleted or renamed
CE0001_object_not_found.solution: Update reference to correct element or recreate

CE0002_attribute_not_found.message: Attribute X not found in entity Y

CE0003_type_mismatch.cause: Wrong data type used in expression or parameter
CE0003_type_mismatch.solution: Convert types or fix the expression

CE0004_security_not_defined.message: No access rules defined for entity X
CE0004_security_not_defined.cause: Entity missing access rules in production security
CE0004_security_not_defined.solution: Add entity access rules for all module roles

null_pointer.message: Cannot perform operation on null object
null_pointer.cause: Object is empty but operation requires value

constraint_violation.solution: Check for existing record before insert

association_owner.message: Cannot set association from non-owner side
association_owner.cause: Trying to set reference from wrong entity
association_owner.solution: Set from owner side (entity with asterisk)

transaction_timeout.solution: Split into smaller transactions, use Task Queue

memory_exceeded.solution: Process in batches, close large datasets

association_not_found.solution: Verify association exists and path is correct

invalid_comparison.solution: Ensure both sides are same type

mda_too_large.cause: Too many files or large resources

database_sync_failed.solution: Review migration, may need manual data fix

constants_missing.solution: Set constant value in target environment

rest_timeout.cause: External service too slow or unreachable
rest_timeout.solution: Increase timeout, add retry logic, check service

ssl_certificate.solution: Import certificate to runtime, or fix external cert

json_parse_error.cause: Response format doesn't match import mapping

authentication_failed.solution: Verify API key, token, or credentials

debugging_tips: Read the full error message carefully
Check the log for stack trace details
Use debugger to step through logic
Add log messages to narrow down location
Check recent changes that might have caused it
Search Mendix Forum for similar issues

useful_resources.support: Mendix Support Portal for licensed issues

sdk_errors_troubleshooting.title: Common SDK Errors and Troubleshooting
sdk_errors_troubleshooting.description: Frequently encountered errors and their solutions

delta_rejected_error.error: Delta was rejected. Delta is based on revision X but latest revision is Y
delta_rejected_error.cause: Someone else committed changes while you were working
delta_rejected_error.solution: Create new working copy from latest revision and reapply changes
delta_rejected_error.prevention: Use short-lived working copies, commit quickly

memory_errors.error: FATAL ERROR: CALL_AND_RETRY_LAST Allocation failed - JavaScript heap out of memory
memory_errors.cause: Model too large for default Node.js memory

property_not_loaded.cause: Trying to access property on interface (not loaded) object
property_not_loaded.solution: Call await element.load() before accessing non-public properties

authentication_errors.401_unauthorized: Check MENDIX_TOKEN environment variable is set correctly
authentication_errors.token_expired: Generate new Personal Access Token at warden.mendix.com

cannot_modify.solution: Only modify your own modules, not protected ones

debugging_techniques.how: Right-click activity → Add breakpoint → Run locally (F5) → Step through
debugging_techniques.benefit: See exact execution flow, inspect variables

debugging_techniques.how: Settings → Logging → Set log level to Debug for specific nodes
debugging_techniques.use_when: Need to understand what's happening internally

debugging_techniques.how: Run → Performance Tool → Execute action → Analyze results
Press F8 or Consistency Errors pane
debugging_techniques.use_when: Before deployment, when things not working

debugging_techniques.how: Add Log Message action to microflow with variables

migration_issues_mendix_11.solution: Upgrade database: MariaDB 10.6+, SQL Server 2022+, MySQL 8.4+

migration_issues_mendix_11.issue: MxObjectVersion attribute conflict (11.5.0+ with optimistic locking)
migration_issues_mendix_11.cause: App already has MxObjectVersion attribute when enabling optimistic locking
migration_issues_mendix_11.solution: Rename existing MxObjectVersion attribute - system attribute cannot be renamed

migration_issues_mendix_11.cause: Storage migrated from IndexedDB to OPFS
migration_issues_mendix_11.solution: One-time migration delay is expected; inform users

migration_issues_mendix_11.issue: JDBC driver update required for SQL Server (11.5.0+)
migration_issues_mendix_11.solution: If using Database Connector with integrated security, update JDBC driver in userlib
migration_issues_mendix_11.impact: MEDIUM - may require manual driver update

migration_issues_mendix_11.solution: Add Read access to home page entities for all roles

migration_issues_mendix_11.cause: React client is default in Mendix 11
migration_issues_mendix_11.solution: Migrate widgets to React or use batch conversion tool (11.4.0+)
migration_issues_mendix_11.tool: Use Studio Pro batch conversion capability or MigrateToReact module from Marketplace

migration_issues_mendix_11.cause: Attempted to recreate already existing column
migration_issues_mendix_11.solution: Fixed in 11.5.0 - update to latest version

steps: If crashed, try restart from Cloud Portal
If persistent, rollback to previous deployment package
Fix and redeploy to acceptance first
Stop app immediately to prevent further damage
Fix data with SQL scripts or microflows
Check Cloud Portal → Metrics for CPU/memory/database
Identify if specific operation or general

logging_best_practices.guideline: Error: failures. Warning: potential issues. Info: important events. Debug: detailed flow.
logging_best_practices.example: Error: 'Failed to process order'; Info: 'Order 123 submitted'; Debug: 'Processing step 3 of 5'

logging_best_practices.guideline: Add identifiers, variable values, operation details
logging_best_practices.example: Order processing failed for OrderID=$Order/ID, Customer=$Customer/Name: $latestError

logging_best_practices.guideline: Never log passwords, tokens, PII unless absolutely necessary and secured
logging_best_practices.example: Log 'User authentication failed' NOT 'Password abc123 incorrect'
